text: "The Men in My Little Girl's Life" is a song written by Mary Candy, Eddie Dean, and Gloria Shayne and performed by Mike Douglas. It reached #3 on the adult contemporary chart and #6 on the U.S. pop chart in 1966. It was featured on his 1966 album The Men in My Little Girl's Life. The song was arranged by Jerry Fielding and produced by Manny Kellem. ==Other charting versions== *Archie Campbell released a version of the song as a single in 1966 which reached #16 on the U.S. country chart. *Tex Ritter released a version of the song as a single in 1966 which reached #50 on the U.S. country chart. ==Other versions== *Telly Savalas released a version of the song on his 1976 album Who Loves Ya Baby. ==References== Category:1965 songs Category:1965 singles Category:1966 singles Category:Songs written by Gloria Shayne Baker Category:Tex Ritter songs Category:Epic Records singles Category:Capitol Records singles
title: The Men in My Little Girl's Life
